mapper.select: select d.*,t.name from t_detail d,t_type t where user_id = #{id} and t.id=d.type_id order by update_time desc

SELECT d.id,d.title,d.update_time,d.views,d.first_picture,d.description,u.avatar as BlogUserAvatar,u.nickname as BlogUsername,t.id as typeId,t.name as typeName,u.id as userId FROM t_detail d JOIN t_user u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN t_type t ON d.type_id = t.id where d.published = 1 ORDER BY d.update_time DESC

SELECT d.title,d.description,d.id,d.update_time,d.views,d.first_picture,u.id as userId,u.nickname as BlogUsername,t.id as typeId,t.name as typeName,u.avatar as BlogUserAvatar FROM t_detail d JOIN t_user u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN t_type t ON d.type_id = t.id WHERE d.published = 1 and t.id = #{id} ORDER BY d.update_time DESC

SELECT d.title,d.description,d.id,d.update_time,d.views,d.first_picture,u.id as userId,u.nickname as BlogUsername,u.avatar as BlogUserAvatar,ty.id as typeId,ty.name as typeName FROM t_detail d JOIN t_user u ON d.user_id = u.id JOIN t_detail_tags dt ON d.id = dt.details_id JOIN t_type ty ON ty.id = d.type_id WHERE d.published = 1 and dt.tags_id = #{id} ORDER BY d.update_time DESC
